titles.title: FLAT Prices Act
FLAT Prices Act
Forcing Limits on Abusive and Tumultuous Prices
A bill to shorten monopoly periods for prescription drugs that are the subjects of sudden price hikes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Forcing Limits on Abusive and Tumultuous Prices or the FLAT Prices Act
This bill directs the Food and Drug Administration to reduce the market exclusivity of an approved prescription drug if the drug manufacturer increases the drug's price by more than a specified percentage. This reduction may be waived under specified circumstances.
